p: The region of the country with the highest number of reported cases of dengue fever was the Southeast, with 49% of the cases in the period, followed by the Northeast (28%), Center-West (14%), North (7%) and South (3%). However, the highest incidence was found in the Center-West, with an average rate of 444.8 cases/100,000 inhabitants, followed by the Southeast (272.7), Northeast (246.7), North (198.6) and South (46.7) ( Fig 2).
